name: Sastrugi
description: Helpful nodes to generate Structure from Form.
contents: ❄_PC_Get_Graphics_Override_Settings - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Get the current OverrideSettings for a Pointcloud Instance., ❄_PC_Get_Scans_and_Regions - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node extracts Scan Names/Origins and Scan Region Names from within a Pointcloud Instance., ❄_PC_Get_Transform_and_Scale - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node returns the Transform Origin/Vectors and Scale of a Pointcloud Instance., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_By_Elevation - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings for Pointcloud by Elevation., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_By_Fixed_Color - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings for Pointcloud by Fixed Color., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_By_Intensity - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings for Pointcloud by Intensity., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_By_Normals - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings for Pointcloud by Normals., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_No-Override - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings for Pointcloud by No-Override., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_Visibilty_Hide - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings to Hide Scans/Regions., ❄_PC_Graphics_Override_Settings_Visibility_Show - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Graphics) Override settings to Show Scans/Regions., ❄_PC_RANSAC_Plane_Detection - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node uses Random sample consensus (RANSAC) to determine planes within Pointclouds and groups point-sets based on these planes., ❄_PC_Reset_Graphics_Override - (Sastrugi-Pointcloud_Graphics) Removes all Graphics overrides from Pointcloud Instances and their embeded Scans / Regions., ❄_PC_Select_Point - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node allows the selection of a single point from a Pointcloud Instance., ❄_PC_Select_Points - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node allows the selection of a multiple points from a Pointcloud Instance., ❄_PC_Select_Points_By_Intersecting_Element - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node takes a sample of random points from a Pointcloud Instance by using an intersecting element as the filter., ❄_PC_Select_Points_By_Local_Sample - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node allows users to select a specific number of Pointcloud Points by selecting a location on the Pointcloud in the Active View, creating a local sample area to extract points., ❄_PC_Select_Points_By_Region - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node allows users to select a specific number of Pointcloud Points by creating a selection region in the Active View., ❄_PC_Select_Points_Randomly - (Sastrugi_Pointcloud_Geometry) This node takes a sample of random points from a Pointcloud Instance., ❄_PC_Set_Graphics_Override - (Sastrugi-Pointcloud_Graphics) Overrides the graphics for a Pointcloud instance in the specified views., ❄_PC_Set_Graphics_Override_for_Regions - (Sastrugi-Pointcloud_Graphics) Overrides the graphics for Region locations within a Pointcloud instance in the specified views., ❄_PC_Set_Graphics_Override_for_Scans - (Sastrugi-Pointcloud_Graphics) Overrides the graphics for Scan locations within a Pointcloud instance in the specified views.
